The five drawbacks of placing faith in a: The individual to whom a person is devoted falls into an offense such that the Saṅgha suspends them.
The individual to whom a person is devoted falls into an offense such that the Saṅgha makes them sit at the end of the line.
The individual to whom a person is devoted departs for another region.
The individual to whom a person is devoted disrobes.
The individual to whom a person is devoted passes away.
